name: Black N' White (Matthew Flegg)
description:
A fun platformer featuring double jumps, moving platforms, enemies, wall jumping and much more to test your skill! The game is completely free to play and is being updated with new features!

Now available to play in-browser!

View the source code below, the game was written in C#, using Unity. If you use any of my code please credit me!

MatthewFlegg/BlackNWhite: Source code for my game 'BlackNWhite' (github.com)
